testcase.classname: User info segment (User Settings) should be editable on Homepage
testcase.name: There should be user info being populated when navigating to user info "firstname, lastname email and language"
testcase.system-out: Given Go to "https://gmibank.com/" link.....................................passed And Click to User drop down menu............................................passed And Click to Sign in........................................................passed And Enter the username with valid credentails...............................passed And Enter the password with valid credentails...............................passed And Click to Sign in button.................................................passed And Click to User drop down menu............................................passed And Click to User info......................................................passed And Assert that First Name is not empty.....................................passed And Assert that Last Name is not empty......................................passed And Assert that Email is not empty..........................................passed

testcase.classname: User info segment (User Settings) should be editable on Homepage
testcase.name: There should be 2 languages available "English and Turkish"
testcase.system-out: And Assert that Language dropdown is have English...........................passed And Assert that Language dropdown is have Türkçe............................passed
